title: Distinguished Eng.-Platform Unification
description: Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal‚Äôs 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.pThe Commerce Solutions and Services Engineering (CSSE) team is responsible for building solutions and platforms used by all PayPal‚Äôs merchants, focusing on the largest customers ‚Äì the Enterprise, Channel Partners and Marketplaces customer segments. We build applications, services and platforms that allow PayPal customers to accept payments globally across all channels, including the Commerce Platform for Enterprises (ca href="https://www.paypal.com/us/business/enterprise"https://www.paypal.com/us/business/enterprisea), Commerce Platform for Platforms and Marketplaces (ca href="https://www.paypal.com/us/business/platforms-and-marketplaces"https://www.paypal.com/us/business/platforms-and-marketplacesa), Braintree platform (ca href="https://www.braintreepayments.com"https://www.braintreepayments.coma), Hyperwallet platform (ca href="https://www.hyperwallet.com"https://www.hyperwallet.coma), among many other responsibilitiespAs a Distinguished Engineer in our team, you will be leading development to define how large-scale merchants worldwide integrate with the current and next-gen PayPal Commerce Platforms. You will play a critical role integrating complex systems and multiple properties into one seamless, unified platform that leverages multiple engines to provide a powerful payments and payouts experience, including API strategy (GraphQL and REST, webhooks, streaming, SDKs), sandbox and playground environments, simulators, and all other aspects of integration and developer experience. These platforms combined are responsible for processing more than half of PayPal‚Äôs transactions worldwide, so this is a high-stakes role ‚Äì there are very few mission critical APIs like this in the world, with this kind of scale and complexity, and that power so much commerce and so many businesses worldwide. You will play a key and critical role defining how the platform developer experience is shown to the world.pThe ideal candidate will prefer to have no direct reports, being passionate to focus on very hard and deep technical problems, and collaborating with many teams to move big rocks forward. That said, as one of the senior-most individual contributors in the engineering ladder, the candidate will be expected to lead hundreds of others through influence, providing guidance and mentoring as needed, making the whole team better through experience, knowledge and technical talent, making the entire organization more capable of successfully completing larger projects with higher technical complexity.pFinally, the ideal candidate has a proven record of leading efforts to solve large, complex problems. They balance competing technical and product requirements, level up the engineers around them, identify and communicate effectively with all stakeholders, and consider both immediate tactical needs and long-term strategic planning.pResponsibilities:p¬∑ Work with Product, Platform and Engineering leaders across the team to identify the most valuable areas of technical contribution, advancing key valuable initiatives, reducing risk on critical projects and advancing our technology stack.p¬∑ Drive both technology and product innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development.p¬∑ Provide technical guidance and leadership in design, development, scaling and operation of software applications.p¬∑ Be a technical subject matter expert and represent the full internal and external capabilities of our platforms to enable solutions to complex, large-scale customers.p¬∑ Mentor, coach, advise and level up engineering talent across the organization.pSkillset and requirements:p¬∑ Bachelors degree in Computer Engineering/Computer Science or related field.p¬∑ Track record leading, developing, and delivering significant software projects.p¬∑ Expertise in designing and troubleshooting large scale distributed systems.p¬∑ Proficiency in managing cloud based large-scale infrastructure. Experience with building solutions on the Cloud (ideally GCP and AWS). Experience designing and building systems with Docker containers and Kubernetes.p¬∑ Experience in Domain Driven Design and modeling complex business domains.p¬∑ Demonstrable experience building complex customer facing platforms, inclusive of complex APIs and other aspects of developer experiences (sandbox, playgrounds, simulators, etc.).p¬∑ Demonstrable and in-depth experience with Java stack. Ruby on Rails very desirable.p¬∑ Some experience with JavaScript and Node.js is highly desired.p¬∑ Experience with Unix/Linux operating systems internals and administration.p¬∑ Established experience with monitoring/logging tools and best practices.p¬∑ Experience in software release lifecycle with modern distributed version control (e.g. git).p¬∑ Experience working in an Agile environment, including Extreme Programming practices like Iterative Development, Continuous Integration (and Deployment) and Test-Driven Development.p¬∑ Great analytical and problem-solving skills.p¬∑ Strong communicator, both written and spoken.pBehaviors:p¬∑ Approach problems with humility, rigor, and decisiveness.p¬∑ Demonstrate a high emotional quotient and empathy for your colleagues, creating psychological safety while tackling tough problems and navigating conflicts.p¬∑ Identify and solicit input from all stakeholders, balancing competing needs and distilling a coherent strategy.p¬∑ Lead by meeting people where they are at and building bridges to where you need them to go.p¬∑ Emphasize iterative progress, risk management, and delivering value.p¬∑ Leave the campsite cleaner and people stronger.pWe're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.pPayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at ca href="mailto:paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com"paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.coma.p

title: Server-side Software Developer
description: cstrongLocation: London or Poznan or Remote (within Europe or Asia)strongpcstrongWe're looking for creative server-side software developersstrongpJoin our back-end teams building user-friendly online services for consumers. We use a micro-services architecture with a broad range of different technology stacks and high levels of automated test coverage. The majority of our back-end is written in Ruby.pcstrongHighlightsstrongpculcliScale and performance challenges. Handle tens of thousands of rpm, scale across geographically distributed datacenters, solve complex computational tasks quickly, and be highly available.licliSecurity. We work with world-class penetration testers.licliAPI design. We have client-side apps for Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Linux, routers, and browser extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. Keep the API designs simple and meet the various requirements for our apps.licliSplit-testing. We make heavy use of A/B testing to optimize our front-end for sales conversions. We have enough volume to often get significant results within one day.liulcstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpculcliYour responsibilities may cover systems that each bring their own set of interesting technical and design challenges, especially around scale, security, and availability.plicliContinuous Delivery. All logic is tested automatically. We deploy multiple times per day. We often use TDD.plicliMicroservices architecture. We can pick the right stack for each individual application. Currently those involve combinations of Ruby, Go, Node.JS, C, mySQL, Postgres, Redis, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Docker, Chef and Ansible.plicliCode-reviews. We invest in spreading knowledge around the team, and keeping our code easy to read, test, and maintain.pliulcstrongRequirementsstrongpculcliYou love to solve problems, you‚Äôre excited about building well-designed systems, eager to learn and continually improve your skills.licliYou take great pride in the quality of your codelicliExpert in at least one modern server-side language. You test your code primarily with automation.licliEager to learn some Ruby (you‚Äôll see a lot of it here, though it won‚Äôt necessarily be your primary language)liulcstrongOptionalstrongpculcliNice to have: Experience building high-load scalable systemslicliNice to have: Devops experience (Linux, Docker, Nginx, Ansible, Kubernetes, Terraform, Cloud-based Databases, Queues)licliIn general, we‚Äôre looking for someone with raw smarts and potential who can easily learn the specific skills needed for our work.licliWe‚Äôre open to candidates with various levels of experience. From junior to very senior, come talk to us!liulcstrongWhat we offerstrongpculcliChallenging work in a fun and collaborative environmentlicliAttractive compensation and time-off benefitslicliSpacious open-concept and centrally located officeslicliFull-time employment with flexible working hourslicliFully stocked pantry with fresh fruit and snackslicliTeam lunches and company events every quarterlicliMulticultural teams represented by 30+ nationalitiesliulcstrongNote: Please upload your resume as a PDF and do not include any salary or compensation information in it.strongp

title: Core/Backend Engineer
description: Here at Playco, we make games that bring the world closer together through play.pOur ideal teammates are thoughtful, humble, and passionate professionals who can both zoom into the details and zoom out to embrace the big picture. We are inspired by makers and tinkerers, who are unafraid to experiment with a healthy disregard for constraints. We hope you'll enrich our team with your enthusiasm and passion, both for games and for life.pOur engineers are generally amazing at something and great at everything else. We write scalable backend systems, cross-compilers, JavaScript / TypeScript game APIs and tools, and whatever else it takes. No matter what you work on each day, you will work with the best engineers in the world; we have top talent in every part of our stack.pcstrongThe RolestrongpculcliBe a key member of a high performing software engineering team.licliArchitect and code sophisticated client/server systems for instant gaming.licliPlay a critical role in day-to-day coding, performance profiling, optimization, and general troubleshooting.licliCollaborate with design, engineering, and production teams to devise optimal engineering solutions to game requirements.licliLearn from and mentor other engineers on your team.licliTake ownership of your projects to make them the best they can possibly be.licliProvide valuable input on the company‚Äôs long-term engineering roadmap and help identify areas of opportunity for improvement.liulcstrongDesired SkillsstrongpculcliBachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience.licli3+ years of professional software engineering experience.licliExperience writing clean, testable, high-quality code and designing highly scalable systems in production.licliSolid familiarity with deployment on cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.).licliStrong Computer Science fundamentals in software systems design, algorithms, and data structures.licliAbility to interact with peers in a constructive and productive style.licliFamiliarity with git, svn, or other VCS.licliGood communication skills and the ability to work effectively on shared projects with designers, artists, testers, product managers, and other developers.licliStrong team player with a positive attitude.liulcstrongBonusstrongpculcliExpert knowledge of NodeJS and ES6 / TypeScript.licliDevOps experience -- setting up CI/CD environments, orchestrating deployments, creating monitoring dashboards, anything that makes the development process easier, more enjoyable and more accountable.licliExperience in game development and shipped titles.liul

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description: cstrongPAI Health has joined forces with Huami Corporation and is scaling up internationally. Help us lead this growth as a Senior Full Stack Engineer!strongpcstrongAbout PAI HealthstrongpOur mission is to become the global health standard for physical activity by delivering personalized digital solutions to promote, inspire and instill active lifestyle habits that lead to improved health outcomes and quality of life. Creative and collaborative working practices are at the core of PAI Health. We aren‚Äôt looking for just another spoke in the wheel; this is your opportunity to make a big global impact with your work in an entrepreneurial environment!pWe care deeply about the growth of our staff, ensuring each member is empowered with the necessary resources and support to not only succeed but flourish in their roles and career. At PAI Health, we are constantly striving to be at the forefront of positive social change and have crafted an inclusive and diverse company culture, which welcomes all to come and thrive here.pcstrongWhat‚Äôs Next for PAI Health?strongpOur science-backed IP and metrics, as well as engaging user experience, has attracted the interest of leading brands including Prudential Asia and Huami Corporation, one of the world‚Äôs largest smart wearable technology companies. With Huami‚Äôs proven AI algorithms, massive data sets and analytical capabilities, global distribution channels, and demonstrated success launching international products in the health tech space, this acquisition has put PAI Health on a whole new playing field.pLooking ahead, we have a unique opportunity to scale up our product at an international level, backed by the expertise and power of a global organization.pcstrongWhat Can You Expect?strongpAs Senior Full Stack Engineer, you will be a technical leader at PAI Health, overseeing code, setting the standard for quality and acting as a trusted advisor to both leadership and your team. You will work closely with our engineering, product management and product design teams to help translate business requirements into delivered platform features.pYou can expect your day-to-day to include:pcstrongCoding (80%)strongpcolcliDrive continuous delivery by participating in our agile development process, including estimating effort and complexity of new features and tasks.licliProduce clean, performant code, establishing quality standards with the engineering team through example and leadership.licliDesign systems architecture, including infrastructure that enables continuous integration and delivery.licliContribute fresh ideas and concepts by actively seeking out new technologies and best practices.liolcstrongMentorship (20%)strongpcolcliLead projects, gathering requirements, setting timelines, communicating milestones, and proactively troubleshooting.licliMentor and lead junior engineers, performing code reviews and delivering meaningful feedback.licliDeliver projects successfully by collaborating with project managers, product management and other key stakeholders.liolcstrongYour Backgroundstrongpculcli5+ years of full stack development experience with relevant post-secondary educationlicliExperience (and interest in) leading teams or projectslicliTeam player ‚Äì you include your team in the process, you‚Äôre not looking to walk alonelicliMentorship ‚Äì you lead by example and give and take constructive feedbacklicliCommunication ‚Äì you can express your ideas concisely and effectivelylicliCommitment ‚Äì you‚Äôre never afraid to suggest alternatives, but always commit to the collective decisionlicliHands-on contributor ‚Äì you enjoy writing code, solving problems, and being in the trencheslicliProcess-oriented ‚Äì you identify as process-orientedlicliConfident ‚Äì you manage stakeholder expectations and know when to say ‚Äòno‚ÄôliulcstrongYour Tech StackstrongpculcliModern full-stack frameworks (NodeJS is ideal)licliModern front-end languages amp; frameworks (React is ideal)licliStrong understanding of AWS and cloud native application development (microservices architecture)licliExperience with DockerliulcstrongNot Convinced Yet?strongpIn addition to being part of a great company with a proven product, you‚Äôll get to work on new and interesting technical challenges every day. You will be a trusted leader as we scale up. You will be empowered to succeed in your role with the resources and technology of an established global market leader. We also offer:pculcliCompetitive compensation with extended benefits to look after the ones you lovelicliFlexible schedule with a commitment to work-life balance ‚Äì put your family first, for reallicliOpportunity to be a valued leader and work closely with our leadership teamlicliOngoing training and development opportunities to propel your careerlicliLeading, modern technology and tools to build and experiment withlicliInclusive and collaborative culture built on communication and respectlicliFun remote (and in-person when possible) social events to spend time with your teammates ‚Äì we‚Äôve done things like virtual escape rooms, music and wellness sessions, trivia nights, and fitness related challenges.licliAtmosphere that encourages an active lifestyle, that suits you. We provide wearable devices to all staff and give away rewards throughout the year.licliTeam that encourages connection and collaboration through friendly competitions, weekly kudos‚Äô, etc. When COVID-19 allows it, we also have a great physical workspace that includes foosball, ping pong, beer on tap, gym, rooftop patio, and more!liulcstrongInterested in learning more? Apply today with your resume and cover letter!strongpcemPAI Health is an Equal Opportunity employer and welcomes everyone to our team. If you need reasonable accommodation at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know. In your application, please feel free to note which pronouns you use (for example: she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).emp
